item.title: Today on the 24th February, as the world marks four years since the beginning of the war in Ukraine,...
item.description:
ğŸ¦ @IsraelMFA

Today on the 24th February, as the world marks four years since the beginning of the war in Ukraine, Israel Stands with the Ukrainian People. Foreign Minister Gideon Saar announced today that Israel will deliver 117 portable power stations to the Kyiv region, following discussions with Ukrainian Foreign Minister Andriy Sybiha on the urgent energy needs. As communities continue to face attacks on critical infrastructure, Israel remains committed to providing practical, life-saving humanitarian
